import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { MyserviceService } from '../myservice.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-cart', templateUrl: './cart.component.html', styleUrls: ['./cart.component.css'], }) export class CartComponent { constructor(private service: MyserviceService) {} dishes: any[] = []; ngOnInit() { this.dishes = this.service.dishes; console.log(this.dishes); } }
